divs: Sighting DetailsMy name is Mark Woody I am a MUFON member in Utah, and a member of the Utah UFO Hunters (UUFOH) We just completed working on a couple of shooting scenes for the History Channel's program UFO HUNTERS. Anyway I just received a call and took some basic notes. The eyewitmess is Mass. got my info from our website aliendave.com I would like to forward this info to the Masssachusettes State director so that he can send out a Field investigator. I feel this witness may be worth investigating, especially for his 1974 sighting. Witness claims that he did take a photo of today's sighting Phone Call Received 22 May 2009 1974 20-25 Miles South of Boston Mass Wrote Betty Hill and receive a reply��� Red Light��� turned Bright white��� Sparks Shoot out of it. Craft was Large as a House, witness could have hit it with a rock. NO SOUND 22 May-2009 TODAY Red on top yellow middle green (solid Colors) hidden in strange clouds Brocken, Massachusetts Mike Mansulla 774-274-9636 Mark Woody ���Asst. Director Utah UFO Hunters, MUFON
Summary: 1974 house size UFO / new sighting today.
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Brockton
There were no other sightings in Brockton on or around May 22nd 2009
